parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> If unit is diving and doesn't have a re-breather, it returns [[false]]. Diving means the unit's head is underwater. If unit is underwater and has a re-breather, the command returns [[true]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''isAbleToBreathe''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_canBreath = [[isAbleToBreathe]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[underwater]]
</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on May 6, 2019 - 19:43 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:vabene1111|vabene1111]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Might return false if player enters a vehicle while underwater.
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
